doc.title: CardDAV

value.content: CardDAV (vCard Extension to WebDAV) is a protocol standardized by the IETF and used to remote-access or share contact information over a server.

value.title: See also
value.content:
• CardDAV on Wikipedia
  • RFC 6352: vCard Extensions to Web Distributed Authoring and Versioning (WebDAV)

doc.summary: CardDAV (vCard Extension to WebDAV) is a protocol standardized by the IETF and used to remote-access or share contact information over a server.
